title: Apple using Front 242 lyrics?
content:
File under: "I didn't think anybody would notice."

I got a chuckle when I noticed that the [Mac Mini page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104054431/http:/www.apple.com/macmini/graphics.html) at Apple is using some [Front 242](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104054431/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewAlbum?playlistId=1657923) lyrics for catchy subheads. (I think it's from their track "Headhunter".) Funny.

author: Joe Pemberton
